title: Developer Review of Warp for Windows, an AI Terminal App
author: David Eastman
description: If you want one terminal that can be used anywhere, then the arrival of Warp for Windows is good news. David Eastman kicks the tires.
cntitle: Warp for Windows 开发者体验：一款 AI 终端应用
cndescription: 如果你想要一个可以在任何地方使用的终端，那么 Warp for Windows 的到来是个好消息。David Eastman 体验了一下。
